title: ‘I’d love to see in T20 cricket, one bowler bowl a fifth over’: Simon Taufel’s suggestion to balance contest between bat and ball
What happens if the Moon disappears
description: Earth's oceans would experience significantly smaller tides without the Moon. Marine life dependent on tidal motion would face drastic changes. Nocturnal predators and prey behavior would shift dramatically. Earth's axial tilt would become unstable, leading to extreme seasonal variations over long periods. Human activities, from coastal industries to agriculture, would be profoundly impacted.

title: Equity 2026: Capex revival likely to gain momentum; defence, infrastructure set to benefit

Improved economic conditions and policy support are driving this revival. Foreign investors may also return in 2026 as corporate earnings are projected to re-accelerate, offering attractive investment opportunities.

title: Magic Johnson & Cookie Johnson 2025 net worth: Earnings and endorsements

title: Xi's message to Trump: Domestic AI and chip R&D surges; claims US barriers fuelled tech independence
description: China's leader Xi Jinping declared significant AI and chipmaking advancements, framing US restrictions as catalysts for tech independence. Global investors are increasingly favoring Chinese tech, seeing strong policy support and rapid AI monetization as key drivers for future growth.

title: Brittany Mahomes shares New Year glimpse as Patrick Mahomes continues rehab
description: Patrick Mahomes is entering 2026 focused entirely on rehab after suffering ACL and LCL tears late in the season. Andy Reid stressed patience, noting Mahomes remains around the team while prioritizing recovery over travel or timelines.

title: York family net worth: How a $13M bet became the 49ers’ $8.4B empire
description: Forbes ranks San Francisco 49ers owner Denise DeBartolo York and her family at $8.4 Billion, placing them ahead of Donald Trump and Mark Cuban. The York family controls over 90% of the 49ers, now valued above $8 Billion, after decades of growth tied to NFL success and global sports investments, according to Forbes 2025 rankings released in September this year.

title: Amazon’s exception for Indians: H-1B delay relief for employees; reverses Andy Jassy’s 2025 move
description: Amazon is giving its India-based employees a temporary remote work pass until early March due to visa processing snags.  But, there are strict rules: no coding, no big strategy talks, and definitely no chatting with customers. This shows how big tech companies are really feeling the pinch from H-1B visa backlogs, messing with their work and how much gets done.

title: Michael Jordan & Yvette Prieto net worth 2025: Career earnings and endorsements

Prieto, a former model and actress, has contributed significantly, with her own estimated net worth and a substantial prenup agreement.

title: Max Scherzer & Erica May-Scherzer net worth 2025: Inside his $180M empire
description: Max Scherzer, the formidable MLB pitcher, has amassed a $180 million net worth by 2025, a testament to his on-field dominance and shrewd financial planning. Wife Erica May-Scherzer, a former player, significantly contributes to their philanthropic endeavors and family's financial stability.
